Fabrico is a renowned and well-established brand in the Dubai market, with over 35 years of experience in providing high-quality furnishings and home decor. Our wide range of products and services include Curtains, Blinds, Upholstery, Cushions, Fire Retardant Treatment, Stain/Water Repellent Treatment, Anti-Bacterial Treatment.

Fabrico is a one-stop-shop for all your furnishings and home decor needs. With a wide range of products and services, including Curtains, Blinds, Upholstery, Cushions, Fire Retardant Treatment, Stain/Water Repellent Treatment, Anti-Bacterial Treatment, we have something for everyone.

01

One-stop-shop for all your furnishings and home decor.

Wide range of products and services, including Curtains, Blinds, Upholstery, Cushions, Fire Retardant Treatment Etc.

02

Fabrico also offers specialized treatments.

Fire Retardant Treatment, Anti-Bacterial Treatment, and Stain/Water Repellent Treatment.

03

Free Consultation

Free Design Consultation! Book a consultation with our expert team to get started.

04

We have also adopted a no pressurized communication policy.

that our customers will never be bombarded with unwanted communications or calls. We value our customers' time and privacy.

Cont
-act

At Fabrico, we understand that purchasing new furnishings and home decor can be a stressful and overwhelming experience. That's why we have implemented a no commission led sales approach, ensuring that our customers are not pressured into making a purchase. We believe that our customers should have the freedom to make their own decisions without feeling rushed or pressured.

Fabrico Office is ready to help you with your Home furniture solution.

fabrico@fabricodubai.com

What can we help you with today?

FABRICO FURNITURE TRADING LLC
